org.simplity.service

Interface ServiceInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HelloJavaDirect, ListService, Service, SuggestionService

    public interface ServiceInterface
extends Component
    Defines a Service

    • Method Detail

      • executeAsAction

        Value executeAsAction(ServiceContext ctx,
                      DbDriver driver)
        this service is called as a step in another service.
        Parameters:
        ctx -
        driver -
        Returns:
        return value of this action(That is, value to be returned to service after executing this service as an action)

      • toBeRunInBackground

        boolean toBeRunInBackground()
        should the service be fired in the background (in a separate thread)?
        Returns:
        true if this service is marked for background execution

      • okToCache

        boolean okToCache()
        can this service instance be cached for performance. caching is enabled only during production. During development, caching is disabled to ensure that the developer gets to execute the latest version of the service always
        Returns:
        true if caching is ok, false otherwise

      • getDataAccessType

        DbAccessType getDataAccessType()
        Returns:
        data base access required by this service

      • respond

        ServiceData respond(ServiceData inputData)
        Parameters:
        inputData -
        Returns:
        service data that has response to be sent to client, as well as data meant for client-agent
